channel.title: Website for auto download
channel.description:
Hey guys, my dropbox doesnt have auto download anymore you now have to click on "download" before it starts. So my client cant connect to it like that. Is there any other website that you can use for automatic downloads?
Thanks!

item.title: Website for auto download
item.dc:creator: @Flame3 John
item.description:
@Flame3 wrote:

Dropbox is an option, but I’d personally recommend putting it on your own website.

Read full topic
